wikitext.*:
On [[2 April]] [[1958]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien|a letter]] to Peter Alford'''.<ref name=CG>{{CG|C}}, p. 523</ref>

*'''Subject:''' Tolkien describes  the recent dinner in Rotterdam and encloses a copy of the menu and programme, with manuscript alterations.<ref name=CG/>
*'''Publication:''' Excerpts appeared in ''[[Sotheby's Valuable Printed Books and Manuscripts 13 December 2001]]''.<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://tolkienbooks.net/php/details.php?reference=72200|articlename=Valuable Printed Books and Manuscripts. 2001|dated=|website=TB|accessed=26 May 2014}}</ref>
